articles.title: DPRK Will Show in Practice Its Warning Is Not Empty Talk: CPRK
articles.content:
DPRK Will Show in Practice Its Warning Is Not Empty Talk: CPRK
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Wednesday released a crucial report in connection with the fact that the reckless military provocations of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors of south Korea against the DPRK have gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					 At the instigation of the U.S. imperialists the south Korean warmongers dared stage an outrageous "precision strike drill" aimed to destroy the office of the supreme headquarters of the DPRK on March 21 with 16 fighter bombers carrying air-to-surface guided missiles involved, the report said, and went on:
					
					 This is a thrice-cursed provocation to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and intolerable hideous confrontation action.
					
					 Under authorization, the CPRK clarifies the following actions to cope with the prevailing grave situation:
					
					 From this moment all the actions of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK including the regular units of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the Workers-Peasant Red Guards, the Young Red Guards and all people will be oriented to launch a retaliatory battle of justice in order to resolutely eliminate the Park Geun Hye group of traitors on this land and under this sky.
					
					 The battle to be fought by the DPRK will be the sacred one for devotedly defending the leader and the one for annihilating the enemy without mercy.
					
					 We do not hide the fact that it may start inside the Chongwadae or near it.
					
					 We had already declared that all the dens of the enemy in south Korea including the Chongwadae are the primary targets of the ultra-precision strike means of the Strategic Force of the KPA ready to go into action.
					
					 The powerful large-caliber multiple rocket launching systems of the invincible KPA artillery units are highly alerted to scorch the Chongwadae bossed by Park Geun Hye in a jiffy. Once their buttons are pushed, it is bound to be reduced to a sea in flames and ashes.
					
					 The KPA units behind enemy lines to be deployed in the operational theater of the southern part of Korea are fully ready to start a storm operation, lightning operation to conquer the Chongwadae and other major targets at one blow any time and mercilessly wipe out Park Geun Hye and other south Korean warmongers.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the Park group should clearly understand the will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to annihilate the enemy as they regard their supreme headquarters and dignity dearer than their own lives.
					
					 There's a limit to our patience.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the Park group of traitors had better pay heed to the DPRK's warning that it has done everything required after having access to everything necessary. They would be well advised to behave prudently, if they wish to spend their remaining days.
					
					 Once it is determined, the DPRK will launch a preemptive attack operation of Korean style to wipe out not only the Park Geun Hye group of traitors but all big or small strongholds of aggression the way the world has never known.
					
					 What the DPRK warns is not hot air.
					
					 It will be clearly proved by the miserable end the U.S. and the Park group will meet while going reckless.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Jordanian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Jordanian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Yahya Qaralleh, ambassador of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Jordanian King
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Jordanian King
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Abdullah Ⅱ, king of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan.
					 It was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by Yahya Qaralleh, new Jordanian ambassador to the DPRK, Wednesday.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Belgian King
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Belgian King
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of sympathy to Belgian King Philippe in connection with brutal terrorist attacks in Brussels that caused many casualties.
					 The message expressed deep consolation and sympathy to the king and, through him, to the victims and their bereaved families.
					
					 The message expressed deep condolences and sympathy to the king and, through him, to the victims and bereaved families.
					
					 It reiterated the DPRK government's invariable stand of opposing all forms of terrorism and expressed hope that Belgium will eradicate the tragic consequences of the recent incident as early as possible and regain stability.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Pakistani President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Pakistani President
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Mamnoon Hussain, president of Pakistan, on Wednesday on the Day of Pakistan.
					 The message wished the Pakistani president success in his responsible work for the country's independent development and prosperity, expressing belief that the long-standing traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Pakistani Prime Minister
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Pakistani Prime Minister
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Muhammad Nawaz Sharif, prime minister of Pakistan, on the occasion of the Day of Pakistan.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields including politics and economy, wishing the prime minister greater successes in his work for national development and social stability.

articles.title: World Water Day Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
World Water Day Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A briefing on Red Cross activities for hygienic water took place at Jangson Senior Secondary School in Unsan County, South Phyongan Province on Tuesday to observe the World Water Day.
					 Present at the event were officials of the DPRK Red Cross Society and the Ministry of Urban Management, other officials concerned and members of the delegations of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross working in the DPRK, and the chairman of the Italian Red Cross Society and his party.
					
					 Speakers recalled that various countries are paying primary attention to preventing water pollution and saving precious water resources in order to tackle ever-serious water shortage.
					
					 The participants played sports amusement games with young RC volunteers and watched an art performance given by schoolchildren's hygienic information disseminating team.
					
					 Earlier, they looked round water supply and drainage facilities built with the aid of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, chatting about the successes made by the Korean people in the work for preserving water resources.
					
					 A launching ceremony of water supply facilities took place in Hwangju County, North Hwanghae Province on the same day.

articles.title: Efforts Paid to Improving Meteorological Observation
articles.content:
Efforts Paid to Improving Meteorological Observation
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made achievements in the work to put meteorological observation and weather forecast on a scientific basis.
					 The State Hydro-meteorological Administration developed automatic observation device to raise the accuracy of weather forecast on the basis of real-time observations.
					
					 It also applied an advanced forecast method to raising the accuracy in forecasting disastrous meteorological phenomena, while pushing ahead with the building of a database.
					
					 Today marks the World Meteorological Day. 
					
					 On this day, various events took place in the country such a meeting for in-depth discussion on the measures adopted at the meeting of the UN Climate Change Conference held in December last year. 
					
					 Choe Kwang Guk, head of the National Meteorological Forecast Squad, told KCNA that they would strive to raise the observation and forecast capabilities in cooperation with the World Meteorological Organization, so as to make contributions to the prevention of disasters.

articles.title: Substitute Agrochemicals Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Substitute Agrochemicals Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Fruit farms in the DPRK produced 75 percent of the planned output of substitute agrochemicals in recent 20 days, an increase of 1.5 times as compared with the same period last year.
					 Unryul and Sinchon fruit farms in South Hwanghae Province turned out polysulfide barium, which is much less than imported agrochemicals in cost and effective in sterilization.
					
					 The Sukchon Youth Fruit Farm in South Phyongan Province developed a new addictive that helps save 50 percent of various kinds of agrochemicals and extend their duration.
					
					 Meanwhile, Sariwon and Samchon fruit farms in North and South Hwanghae provinces produced a large quantity of vegetable agrochemicals.

articles.title: Production of Phosphate Fertilizer on Increase
articles.content:
Production of Phosphate Fertilizer on Increase
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Production of phosphate fertilizer is on the increase in the DPRK with the 70-day campaign as a momentum.
					 According to data available at the Phosphate Fertilizer Industry Management Bureau, the monthly plan was carried out at 105 percent as of March 21, four times higher as compared with the same period last year.
					
					 The Ssangryong, Tongam, Taedaeri, Phungnyon and other mines under the Ministry have operated vehicles and mining facilities at full capacity, over-fulfilling their daily quotas over 160 percent.
					
					 The increased production of phosphate fertilizer is encouraging agricultural workers to round off farming preparations.

articles.title: Production Upsurge Witnessed in DPRK
articles.content:
Production Upsurge Witnessed in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The working class of the DPRK are bringing about upsurge in production and construction in the ongoing 70-day campaign with the will to shatter the anti-DPRK war drills and crude sanctions of the U.S. imperialists and Park Geun Hye puppet group of south Korea.
					 The Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex has generated more tens of thousands of kilowatts than scheduled on a daily basis.
					
					 According to data available at the Ministry of Coal Industry, a daily increase of  over 5,000 tons of coal output has been registered, as compared with January, thus doubling the supply of coal to electric power, metallurgical and chemical industries.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and the Chollima Steel Complex have increased steel and rolled steel production up to 2.7 times and 1.9 times after the start of the campaign against the same period last year.
					
					 The field of railway transportation has cut the turn-round of freight wagons by 24 hours after the start of the campaign, while increasing the freightage nearly 1.1 times.
					
					 Meanwhile, the builders of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station worked such miracles as carrying out 12,000 cubic meters of dam filling within 24 hours.

articles.title: DPRK Responds to Enemies' War Drills with Construction
articles.content:
DPRK Responds to Enemies' War Drills with Construction
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, recently declared the start of building Ryomyong Street in the capital city of Pyongyang, a manifestation of the DPRK's will to answer the nuclear war drills of the U.S. imperialists and their followers with vigorous economic construction.
					 The construction of Ryomyong Street is a huge project as it is to be built in an area between the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and Ryonghung Crossroads.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the past history of socialist construction in the DPRK were the days when its people had worked admirable feats and miracles in production and construction under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in face of the enemies' vicious sanctions and aggression moves.
					
					 In the 1960s and 1970s when the situation of the Korean Peninsula was inching close to the brink of a war due to the case of U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo and the Panmunjom incident, the great leaders of the DPRK showed the strong will that socialist construction should be continued until midnight today even if a war may break out tomorrow.
					
					 In 1994 when the enemies asserted that the DPRK's collapse was a matter of time, Kim Jong Il issued an order of the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army to build Chongryu Bridge (second stage) and Kumrung Tunnel No. 2 in Pyongyang.
					
					 Such edifices as Chollima Street, Unha Scientists Street and Wisong Scientists Dwelling District in the DPRK are results of the boldness and guts of the great leaders, peerlessly brilliant commanders.
					
					 Ryomyong Street, to be built within this year under the far-reaching plan of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, will serve as a monument of historic significance as it is a declaration of death to the enemy and the victory to the Korean people.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued individual stamps of two kinds reflecting the spirit of the present era vibrant with the drive to glorify the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with the greatest heyday of the revolution.
					 The stamp bearing slogan "Let all dash forward toward May of victory under the leadership of the great party!" reflects the revolutionary spirit of the army and people of the DPRK who advance along the road of the Korean revolution, true to the idea and spirit of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK.
					
					 There is a stamp depicting a builder who holds higher the letter of the Central Committee of the WPK to all party members with the construction site of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 for a background and slogan "Let all become honorable victors in the '70-day campaign' of loyalty!"

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Condemns Japan for Working Hard to Grab Tok Islets
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Condemns Japan for Working Hard to Grab Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Japan's moves to distort history have gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					 The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on March 18 confirmed and made public the results of the screening of the textbooks dealing with social subjects including geography and history for the senior high schools from 2017.
					
					 According to it, among 35 kinds of Japanese textbooks dealing with social subjects, Tok Islets were marked as "part of the territory of Japan" in 27 kinds of history textbooks and the description that "the military was involved in drafting sexual slaves" was deleted from most of the textbooks.
					
					 This means 69 percent of the textbooks dealt with Tok Islets two years back but 77 percent of them described the islets as "part of territory of Japan" at present. Consequently, distorted history that Tok Islets belong to Japan will be taught at most of senior high schools in Japan in the wake of primary and secondary schools. 
					
					 The present chief executive of Japan has persistently tampered with history, tailoring the standard for screening textbooks and "teaching manuals" to the stand of right-wing forces after amending the basic law on education.
					
					 The Japanese government revised the "teaching manuals" for secondary and senior high schools for 2014 so that Tok Islets are described as part of the inalienable territory of Japan.
					
					 It set up a "Takeshima (Tok Islets) data room" at the Shimane Prefectural Office of Japan in a desperate bid to increase the awareness of "claim to Tok Islets" among Japanese.
					
					 It is leaving no means untried to implant the wrong picture of Tok Islets into the minds of the young Japanese.
					
					 For example, it brought out a fairy tale about the animal which was exterminated by Japanese while living in Tok Islets and organized a special lecture to convince them that Tok Islets belong to Japan.
					
					 Shimane Prefecture distributed among schools the map which wrongly marked the boundary of Japan between Ullung Island and Tok Islets.
					
					 The Japanese government's serious moves to make textbooks veer to the Right and distort history through them find their manifestation in its undisguised scenario to distort history such as denying the coercion involved in the sexual slavery after reaching "an agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery with the south Korean puppet regime in December, 2015.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are absurd enough to falsify facts by teaching the students distorted history.
					
					 History can neither be altered nor rewritten.
					
					 Some historical materials discovered in Japan prove that the then Japan itself recognized Tok Islets as part of the territory of Korea.
					
					 The "complete map of Japan" drawn by the Staff Department of the Ministry of Army of Japan in 1877 was obtained and opened to public in Japan some years before.
					
					 The map dealt with the whole territory of Japan in detail but it did not mark Tok Islets.
					
					 Tok Islets were not marked in the area catalogue of the map done by the Department of Land Survey of Japan in 1899 on the scale of 1:200,000.
					
					 Many maps drawn till 1905 included Tok Islets in the territory of Korea.
					
					 The islets are an inalienable part of the territory of Korea unthinkable apart from the history of the Korean nation spanning 5000 years.
					
					 Japan should properly face up to the reality.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the Japanese imperialists could go reckless to grab others' territories and launch overseas aggression in the last century.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries can never translate into reality their militarist scenario for establishing the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere", which they failed to do in the past, by teaching the distorted history to the younger generation and thereby hurling them into overseas aggression and reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 They would be well advised to stop running amuck to grab others' territory, a daydream, but honestly redress its crime-woven past, to begin with.

articles.title: Cooperation with Foreign Forces Will Only Invite Disgrace and Disaster: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Cooperation with Foreign Forces Will Only Invite Disgrace and Disaster: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group has gone so reckless as to boost cooperation with the U.S. for a war against the north, vociferating about "tightened alliance" with the U.S. This is despicable treacherous act of offering everything for the U.S. master's implementation of his strategy for world domination. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The reckless acts of the Park's group of traitors keen on cooperation with outside forces for a war against the north are only bringing the danger of a nuclear war to this land. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye is the worst traitor and the most wicked stooge of the outside forces as she unhesitatingly sacrifices the destiny of the nation to ingratiate herself with the U.S. master.
					
					 When the hordes of traitors are allowed to run wild to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north, backed by outside forces, Korea is bound to suffer war disasters. This is not only the lesson drawn by the Korean nation in the last century but the one taught by what is happening at present.
					
					 The south Korean people are exposed to uneasiness and horror of war, and the peace and security on the Korean peninsula are gravely threatened owing to the Park's group of traitors keen to invade the north in collusion with the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation.
					
					 The root cause of disaster should be rooted out as early as possible.
					
					 It is urgent to severely punish the Park group for the security of the Korean nation and peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The reality helps the Koreans in the north, the south and overseas renew this will.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Sparking Nuclear Arms Race
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Sparking Nuclear Arms Race
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has completely discarded the smokescreen of "building a world without nuclear weapons" so much touted by it. 
					 It is now desperately pushing forward the project for improving and modernizing nuclear weapons in a new way.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard: The U.S. nuclear ambition will remain unchanged no matter who becomes its president.
					
					 The U.S. advocacy of "a world without nuclear weapons" is designed to gain time to hold a nuclear edge over other nuclear powers.
					
					 Various nuclear weapons states are vying with each other to beef up nuclear force.
					
					 Obama made the initiative on "building a world without nuclear weapons" and adopted it as a policy for the purpose of disarming nuclear weapons states through appeasement and deception and establishing a monopoly of nuclear weapons in a bid to dominate the world.
					
					 This is precisely the reason why the U.S. pretended to implement the treaty on reducing nukes concluded with Russia but is openly violating it under this or that pretext.
					
					 The reality indicates that the U.S. seeks to unhesitatingly use new type nuclear weapons in a war of aggression against the potential rivals including the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal disturbing world peace and stability and sparking a nuclear arms race as it seeks to plunge the earth in a horrible nuclear disaster.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Sophism about DPRK's "Threat to Peace"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses U.S. Sophism about DPRK's "Threat to Peace" 
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The U.S. authorities are busy these days reeling off a litany of jargons that "global peace is disturbed" by the DPRK and in order to preserve peace, it is necessary for the international community to take more high-handed coordinated measures. And whenever an opportunity presents itself, they claim the war drills being staged against the DPRK are "a strong warning message to the provocations." 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article dismisses the U.S. authorities' accusation against the DPRK as sophism that does not deserve even a passing note.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 We cannot but clarify who truly wants peace and who really threatens it. 
					
					 The U.S. is the arch criminal threatening and disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Peace is seriously threatened on the peninsula and in the region due to the reckless saber-rattling of the U.S. to realize its reckless scenario to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. target is not only the DPRK. It is the final purpose of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and contain the neighboring countries with the whole peninsula as a springboard and thus realize its ambition to dominate Northeast Asia and, furthermore, the rest of the world. Precisely for this reason the U.S. is frequently staging nuclear war drills on the peninsula, straining the regional situation.
					
					 The U.S. is persistently denying this fact to accuse the DPRK. This is nothing but a shameless artifice to cover up its true colors as an intimidator and wrecker of peace and pass the buck to others.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to preserve peace on the peninsula and in the rest of the world.

articles.title: Foot-and-Mouth Disease Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Foot-and-Mouth Disease Hits S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Foot-and-mouth disease broke out at a farmhouse in Hongsong County, South Chungchong Province of south Korea on Monday, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The disease is spreading, causing damage in many farmhouses of south Korea.

articles.title: Zika Virus Infected Man Found in S. Korea
articles.content:
Zika Virus Infected Man Found in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A man was found infected with Zika virus in south Korea, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 A test confirmed the man in his 40s residing in Kwangyang City, South Jolla Province was Zika positive on Tuesday.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Provocation under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Reckless Provocation under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The 1st Division of the marine corps of the south Korean puppet army formed 3 000-strong regiment-level rapid task force comprising airborne, mountain warfare and surprise attack commando battalions capable of advancing into all parts of the Korean peninsula within 24 hours, according to the south Korean MBC on March 20.
					 This is allegedly tasked to rapidly infiltrate into the areas of the DPRK in contingency and destroy core facilities.
					
					 It was reported that the force inaugurated on March 1 verified in detail the capability to perform its wartime mission by participating in Ssangyong drills staged under the scenario for "occupying Pyongyang" at the first phase of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					
					 The warmongers would be well advised to bear in mind that their reckless last-ditch efforts would only precipitate their self-ruin.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the North and the South Open the Way to Peace and the Reunification of the Country in a United Effort" was published in booklet by the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association.
					 The work published on Feb. 20, Juche 81 (1992), clarifies the principles of national reunification. 
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony was held on March 18.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Observed in Spain
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Observed in Spain
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A Spanish preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Tarragona on March 15.
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and hold colorful political and cultural events such as a celebration on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Slovak Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Slovak Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A Slovak preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated with due ceremony in Bratislava on March 9.
					 Ivan Draxler, chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea who doubles as chairman of the Slovakia-Korea Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and conduct brisk activities for solidarity with the Korean people who are dynamically building a thriving socialist nation on the occasion of the meeting.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Observed in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Observed in Italy
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung was formed in Milano on March 16.
					 The chief of the Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea who doubles as representative of the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from March 16 to April 17 and decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and organize various political and cultural events such as a celebration, seminar and book and photo exhibition in the period.

articles.title: Russian On-line Magazine Introduces Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Career
articles.content:
Russian On-line Magazine Introduces Kim Il Sung's Revolutionary Career
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Russian on-line magazine Remchichi in a special write-up observed the 93rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's start of his 250-mile journey for learning. The special write-up was illustrated with an art work depicting the President on the journey.
					 The article said:
					
					 The President started the journey at his early age true to his father's intention on March 16, 1923.
					
					 He kept in his mind his father's saying that one should deeply experience the misfortune suffered by the Korean nation and have a better understanding of the Korean history and culture.
					
					 Out of his great intention and strong will, he made his way through steep ridges and deep valleys.
					
					 While witnessing the country's miserable plight during his journey, he hardened his strong will to wipe out the Japanese imperialist aggressors at any cost and build a new society in which people are its master.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Nepal
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Nepal
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Baktapur, Nepal on March 16.
					 The chairman of the Central Committee, the director of the International Department of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party and other speakers said that the DPRK's H-bomb test is a due self-defensive measure taken to protect the country's sovereignty and nation's right to existence from the ever-increasing nuclear threat of the U.S.
					
					 Labeling the joint military rehearsals kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces as an obvious crime, they strongly urged them to immediately halt the drills. They went on:
					
					 The present world situation, where power and strong-arm acts rule the roost and even big powers surrendered to the U.S. high-handed practices, threat and blackmail, goes to prove how just the DPRK was when it was determined to become a nuclear weapons state under the unfurled banner of Songun.
					
					 Many foreign countries and peoples that set store by justice, progress and peace are admiring and supporting socialist Korea which has undauntedly fought against the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The speakers expressed the belief that the Korean people would surely win a greater victory in the anti-U.S. struggle and the building of a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: UNSC's "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK under Fire in Romania
articles.content:
UNSC's "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK under Fire in Romania
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Romanian Workers' Association made public a statement on March 5.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The UN Security Council invented the harsh and unreasonable "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK under the U.S. pressure.
					
					 The "sanctions resolution" was to serve the ulterior purpose of the U.S. and its stooges to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea should immediately stop escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. had better make a measured approach to the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.

articles.title: U.S.-South Korea Military Exercises Condemned by Thai Body
articles.content:
U.S.-South Korea Military Exercises Condemned by Thai Body 
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand made public a statement on March 16.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The danger of a nuclear war is daily increasing on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16.
					
					 The DPRK made clear its principled stand to go into just operations to preemptively strike the enemy if any slight sign of their moves is spotted.
					
					 The DPRK had access to its nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. hostile policy and ever-increasing nuclear threat.
					
					 This is a due measure taken by a sovereign state for self-defence.
					
					 As known to the world, the Korean people hold their leader as the sun in high esteem and have built a politico-ideological and military power, rallied close around him.
					
					 It cannot but be a risk-taking and dangerous move that the U.S. and south Korea seek to ignite a nuclear war, insulting and threatening these people.
					
					 We demand an immediate stop to the nuclear war drills, terming them a grave provocation to disturb peace on the peninsula and in the rest of the world.

articles.title: CRPP advierte a EE.UU. y banda de traidores de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRPP advierte a EE.UU. y banda de traidores de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relación con que ya pasan el límite las locuras provocativas militares de los Estados Unidos y la horda traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye contra la República Popular Democrática de Corea, el Comité por la Reunificación Pacífica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo pública el día 23 una información importante.
					El día 21, bajo la instigación de los imperialistas yanquis, los belicistas del círculo militar surcoreano perpetraron el "entrenamiento de ataque de precisión" destinado a destruir atrevidamente la oficina de la Dirección Suprema de la RPDC movilizando las escuadrillas de 16 cazabombarderos cargados con proyectiles teledirigidos aire-tierra.
					
					La nota lo califica de temeraria provocación a la máxima dignidad de la RPDC y de intolerable locura conflictiva.
					
					Con respecto a esta situación grave, el CRPP, bajo la autorización, declaró como sigue:
					
					Desde ahora, todos los movimientos de las unidades regulares del Ejército Popular de Corea, el Ejército Rojo Obrero-Campesino, la Guardia Juvenil Roja y otras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y todo el pueblo se dirigirán a la justa guerra de represalia para eliminar tajantemente a la banda de traidores de Park Geun-hye en este territorio.
					
					Nuestra guerra de represalia es la sagrada batalla de defensa a ultranza al líder y de aniquilamiento despiadado a los enemigos. 
					
					No ocultamos que nuestra guerra de represalia puede iniciarse dentro o cerca de Chongwadae.
					
					Ya hemos declarado que el primer blanco de los medios de golpe superpreciso de nuestras fuerzas estratégicas emplazadas para el combate real es todos los nidos de los enemigos de la zona surcoreana inclusive Chongwadae.
					
					Los orgullosos lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados de grueso calibre de nuestra artillería también están dispuestos para exterminar en un instante Chongwadae, nido de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Si apretamos el botón, toda la extensión surcoreana se convertirá indudablemente en el mar de fuego y en cenizas.
					
					Nuestras unidades a meterse en la zona de operación de la parte surcoreana están listas completamente para entrar en la operación de tempestad, la de relámpago de aniquilar sin piedad a Park y los belicistas militares ocupando en cualquier tiempo y de un tirón Chongwadae y otros objetos importantes.
					
					Los imperialistas yanquis y la banda de Park deben ver correctamente el temple de aniquilar a los enemigos del ejército y pueblo de la RPDC que aprecian más que su vida la Dirección Suprema, la máxima dignidad.
					
					Nuestra paciencia también tiene límite.
					
					Los imperialistas yanquis y la banda de traidores de Park no deben desoír la advertencia de la RPDC que ya ha hecho todo lo posible y tiene todo lo necesario. sino deben actuar con prudencia si quieren mantener su vida restante.
					
					Si nos decidimos una vez, se desplegará de modo inédito y relámpago la operación de ataque preventivo a nuestro estilo para eliminar no sólo la banda de traidores de Park, sino también todas las bases de agresión de diferentes dimensiones. 
					
					Nuestras palabras no son vanas.
					
					Lo comprobará claramente el fin trágico de los imperialistas yanquis y la banda traidora de Park que actúan con imprudencia.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en RPDC acto dedicado a Dia Mundial de Agua
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en RPDC acto dedicado a Dia Mundial de Agua
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 22 un acto de dar a conocer las actividades higienicas de aguas de cruz roja dedicado al Dia Mundial de Agua en la Escuela Secundaria Superior de Jangson del distrito de Unsan de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los funcionarios de los dominios correspondientes incluyendo la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el Ministerio de Urbanismo y los miembros de las delegaciones de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja y del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja que trabajan en la RPDC y el presidente de la Sociedad de la Cruz Roja de Italia y su comitiva, de visita en la RPDC.
					
					Hubo discursos.
					
					Los oradores recordaron que para solucionar el problema de aguas cada dia mas grave, varios paises del mundo prestan primordial atencion a las labores para prevenir la contaminacion de agua y ahorrar el precioso recurso de agua.
					
					Enfatizaron que debe elevar los conocimientos sobre la higiene de agua para que todos participen en esta labor.
					
					Realizaron juegos deportivos y recreativos y vieron la funcion de propaganda higienica de los alumnos.
					
					Con anterioridad, los participantes conversaron sobre los exitos alcanzados por el pueblo coreano en las labores de proteccion y cuida de los recursos de agua y recorrieron las instalaciones de acueducto y alcantarillado construidas bajo la cooperacion de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja.
					
					Por otra parte, se efectuo el mismo dia la ceremonia inaugural de las instalaciones de abastecimiento de agua con motivo de ese dia en el distrito de Hwangju de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador de Jordania
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador de Jordania
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- Yahya Qaralleh presento el dia 23 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino Hachemita de Jordania en la RPDC.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente de Abdullah II
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente de Abdullah II
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dirigiera el rey del Reino Hachemita de Jordania, Abdullah II.
					Yahya Qaralleh, nuevo embajador de Jordania en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea lo entrego el dia 23 a Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
